title: 3.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a pseudocode and JavaScript code for a weather application that displays the temperature for each day of the week. It can use a list to store the temperatures and access it using its index to display them on the screen. Also, display the highest temperature and the average temperature.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
